release_notes: Remote debug logging with GitHub Gist upload, verbose logging throughout sync process
changelog: NEW: Remote debug logging - logs auto-uploaded to private GitHub Gist
NEW: Logs organized by GHL Location ID in subfolders
NEW: Send Logs button and Auto-send toggle on About tab
NEW: Auto-send ON by default for new installations
IMPROVED: Verbose logging for XML parsing, contact operations, invoices
IMPROVED: Media upload logging with file paths, sizes, API responses
IMPROVED: Contact sheet workflow logging with success/failure details
